mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO attendance_raw (employee_id, employee_name, department, record_date, attendance_status, attendance_point, custom_name, data_source, process_type, temperature, temperature_abnormal) VALUES
(#{item.employeeId}, #{item.employeeName}, #{item.department}, #{item.recordDate}, #{item.attendanceStatus}, #{item.attendancePoint}, #{item.customName}, #{item.dataSource}, #{item.processType}, #{item.temperature}, #{item.temperatureAbnormal})
